20101226160552.000|20101226160555.000|CC1|THE ESTATE TAX PROVISIONS.      
20101226160555.000|20101226160556.000|CC1|SO WHEN YOU MARRY THE TWO, YOU

20101226160558.000|20101226160600.000|CC1|ABLE TO GET THE BIPARTISAN

20101226160631.000|20101226160634.000|CC1|BEST FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE,   
20101226160634.000|20101226160635.000|CC1|NOT WHAT'S IN HIS SHORT-TERM

20101226160643.000|20101226160645.000|CC1|IS IMPROVING, IT IS STILL       
20101226160645.000|20101226160645.000|CC1|FRAGILE.                        
20101226160645.000|20101226160646.000|CC1|AND HE DID NOT WANT TO HAVE     
20101226160646.000|20101226160649.000|CC1|PEOPLE SEE THEIR TAX GOES UP AND
20101226160649.000|20101226160652.000|CC1|HE KNEW THAT WAS WHAT WAS GOING 
20101226160652.000|20101226160654.000|CC1|TO HAPPEN.

20101226160654.000|20101226160655.000|CC1|JUST TO FIGHT AND TAKE THAT     
20101226160655.000|20101226160655.000|CC1|CHANCE.                         
20101226160655.000|20101226160656.000|CC1|SO, WHAT HE REALIZES IS THAT HE 
20101226160656.000|20101226160658.000|CC1|HAD TO BE PRAGMATIC, BUT HE WAS 
20101226160658.000|20101226160701.000|CC1|BEING PRAGMATIC IN ORDER TO
